Name: Semargl
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Claws of Semargl.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.
Once per battle after this formation has completed a charge you may roll 3D6. For each result of 3+, each other formation (friend or foe) within 3" suffers D6 ethereal damage.
At the end of a step in which this formation loses any health roll a D6. On a result of 4+ this formation may immediately perform a normal move or disengage up to 6".
